Source code for app.source.utente.UserAuth

from flask_login import UserMixin
from sqlalchemy.util import text_type

from app import login_manager




[docs]@login_manager.user_loader
def load_user(user_email):
    from app.models import User
    return User.query.get(str(user_email))




[docs]class UserAuth(UserMixin):



[docs]    def get_id(self):
        try:
            return text_type(self.email)
        except AttributeError:
            raise NotImplementedError('No `id` attribute - override `get_id`')
